snippet.title: Pedal Rebel VR | Indie Game Teaser Trailer Announcement
snippet.description:
This is the official teaser trailer for my first indie game Pedal Rebel VR.
A heart pumping cyberpunk street racing game played on an real exercise bike in VR.

You become part of the game by using your pedal power to speed through the cyberpunk streets, leaning into turns, while dodging and weaving through speeding traffic. From the moment you begin, you are so completely engrossed in fast and fun gameplay that Pedal Rebel VR doesn’t feel like exercising.
As you hit speed boosters and build momentum, your score skyrockets, intensifying the awesome synthwave soundtrack, motivating you to keep it up.
The faster you go, the faster you need to react! 
Narrowly avoiding traffic will earn you skill points, but collisions will slow you and the music down pushing you to get back in the groove, and regain your lost speed and points.
This thrilling high risk high reward gameplay enables you to play your way, set your own pace, while simultaneously being motivated to push your limits, improve your skills, and reach a new high score.
